31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SID_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SID_H_
33
34typedef struct ksiddomain {
35 char *kd_name; /* Domain part of SID */
36 uint_t kd_len;
37} ksiddomain_t;
38typedef void ksid_t;
39
40static __inline ksiddomain_t *
41ksid_lookupdomain(const char *domain)
42{
43 ksiddomain_t *kd;
44 size_t len;
45
46 len = strlen(domain) + 1;
47 kd = kmem_alloc(sizeof(*kd), KM_SLEEP);
48 kd->kd_len = (uint_t)len;
49 kd->kd_name = kmem_alloc(len, KM_SLEEP);
50 strcpy(kd->kd_name, domain);
51 return (kd);
52}
53
54static __inline void
55ksiddomain_rele(ksiddomain_t *kd)
56{
57
58 kmem_free(kd->kd_name, kd->kd_len);
59 kmem_free(kd, sizeof(*kd));
60}
61
62static __inline uint_t
63ksid_getid(ksid_t *ks)
64{
65
66 panic("%s has been unexpectedly called", __func__);
67}
68
69static __inline const char *
70ksid_getdomain(ksid_t *ks)
71{
72
73 panic("%s has been unexpectedly called", __func__);
74}
75
76static __inline uint_t
77ksid_getrid(ksid_t *ks)
78{
79
80 panic("%s has been unexpectedly called", __func__);
81}
82
83#define kidmap_getsidbyuid(zone, uid, sid_prefix, rid) (1)
84#define kidmap_getsidbygid(zone, gid, sid_prefix, rid) (1)
85
86#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_SID_H_ */
87
